title: orthodoxy
comment: The holding of religious beliefs that are in harmony with the accepted views of the community of faith. Right belief (orthodoxy) is to show itself in right practice (orthopraxis).

children.title: orthodoxy, in OT
children.comment: The acceptance of God's revelation of himself to his people that should lead to worship and obedience.

orthodoxy, in NT
children.comment: Acceptance of the truth, especially about Jesus Christ, that is revealed by the Holy Spirit in the gospel and is passed on through the teaching of sound doctrine.
